gamemodes.name: BSkyBlock
gamemodes.description: Create your island in the sky!

gamemodes.name: AcidIsland
gamemodes.description: Create your island in a sea full of acid!

gamemodes.name: AOneBlock
gamemodes.description: You spawn on a block. Just one block. What do you do?

gamemodes.name: CaveBlock
gamemodes.description: Try to survive in a world made up of stone!

gamemodes.name: Boxed
gamemodes.description: A game mode where you are boxed into a tiny space that only expands by completing advancements.

addons.name: Level
addons.description: Make your players compete in order to be in the Top Ten!

addons.name: Warps
addons.description: Create Warps on your islands for players to come and visit!

addons.name: Biomes
addons.description: Allows your players to choose their island's biome.

addons.name: Limits
addons.description: Limit blocks and entities your players can place on their islands.

addons.name: IslandFly
addons.description: Let your players fly inside their island boundaries.

addons.name: InvSwitcher
addons.description: Separate player inventories between gamemode worlds.

addons.name: TwerkingForTrees
addons.description: Twerk to make trees grow faster on your island.

addons.name: VoidPortals
addons.description: Teleport into dimensions by jumping into the Void!

addons.name: MagicCobblestoneGenerator
addons.description: Turn the cobblestone generators to magic ones!

addons.name: Greenhouses
addons.description: Personal biomes in a glass greenhouse.

addons.name: DimensionalTrees
addons.description: Change the materials that make up the trees in the Nether and the End.

addons.name: CauldronWitchery
addons.description: Let your players summon mobs using a Cauldron and some magic!

addons.name: Likes
addons.description: Let your players like or dislike other islands!
